blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: In Search Of Your Glory
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Dlmqad

by NothingxRemains

When Tony woke up that day, he hadn’t expected anything out of the ordinary to happen. And by the end of it, nothing out of the ordinary did happen. Not really, anyway.

Except, well.

He thinks it might have been something like love at first sight.

Words: 2248, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Loki (Marvel), Tony Stark, Obadiah Stane, Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Loki/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Love at First Sight, Human Loki (Marvel), Slow Burn, Light Angst, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Pre-Iron Man 1, Iron Man 1, Slice of Life, Meet-Cute, Tony Stark Does What He Wants, Loki (Marvel) Does What He Wants, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Loki (Marvel) Needs a Hug, Aromantic, Aromantic Character, Aromantic Loki, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, T for swearing

title: Shadow Tribute: Stan Lee
body:
Shadow Tribute: Stan Lee

11.14.18

This post is a tribute to Stan Lee, who passed away Monday. Here is a guy who created the heroes and villains you see today. Generations have enjoyed and appreciated the stories and now a whole new generation can see the works. Here is a video tribute from Marvel and IMDB. 

[youtube=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vHC…

View On WordPress

blog.description: Join us on our journey to help end extreme poverty by 2030. As a Global Citizen, you can learn about the issues, take action on what matters most to you and be part of a community committed to social change.

summary: Crimson Dawn Psylocke- custom commission from a fan on Facebook. I had some extra fun on this one and actually busted out the...
caption:
Crimson Dawn Psylocke- custom commission from a fan on Facebook. I had some extra fun on this one and actually busted out the colored pencils, which is rare for me. I think the difference shows!

9x12 toned grey @strathmoreart sketch paper with @copicmarker and @prismacolor pencils!

DM me if you’re interested in booking your own custom piece!

#psylocke #xmen #draw #coloredpencil #marvel #sketch #drawing #art
https://www.instagram.com/p/BqK0894holG/?utm_source=ig_tumblr_share&igshid=1p6lql25tsybm

summary: What CAN'T you say about one of the great ones we lost, Stan "The Man" Lee? Legends never die... EXCELSIOR! "Ever...
caption:
What CAN’T you say about one of the great ones we lost, Stan “The Man” Lee? Legends never die… EXCELSIOR! “Ever Upward!”

Fonts chosen specifically: Comic Sans (comic without ☹️) and Magneto for ‘x’.

Thanks to Dan at @libertytattooco for my third tattoo and first in color!

#stanlee #ripstanlee #marvel #marvelcomics #excelsior #venom #carnage #daredevil #newtattoo #thirdtattoo #thirdtimesacharm #dragonred #comicsans #magneto #libertytattoocompany (at Liberty Tattoo Company)
https://www.instagram.com/p/BqK035hl9Bi/?utm_source=ig_tumblr_share&igshid=1sya31df9yuaw

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

body:
Rest in Peace, Stan Lee

The World greatest Hero

But now you finally reunited with your Wife and can watch your Superheroes from a Star together with her like a real Watcher ❤

Have Fun on your new Adventures with her
